page.title: 18RELIGION:ASHLEWORTH
page.content: Ashleworth and Hasfield are joined with Tirley as a United Benefice.Each village has a{Church of England Church.One Vicar is the incumbent for the three parishes in the Diocese of Gloucester.{Roman Catholics}attend church in Gloucester.{Methodists} attend chapel in Hartpury or Gloucester.There is a C.E.Sunday School held in Ashleworth School every Sunday. Congregations in church are small,apart from attendance at Easter, Christmas,Harvest and main Church Festivals, when the church will be full.About once in three years a festival is held to raise money for the church.Then all the villagers help to make it a success,regardless of their denomination.As a result of the Ashleworth Festival the church in Ashleworth is in a good state of repair.
